cover_page.structure: Z-layered slideshow. Text overlay centered with 'glitch' effect for Vampire, 'fade' for Echo.

about_page.structure: CSS Grid 'Tetris' layout. Irregular panel sizes. Thick borders for Vampire (Comic Noir), Soft white borders for Echo (Shojo Manga).

gallery_page.structure: Dynamic columns. Images zoom on hover.

achievements_page.structure: Vertical timeline with connecting lines. Nodes glow when unlocked.

tribute_page.structure: Slow Ken Burns effect. Darker, respectful overlay even in Echo mode.

buttons.vampire: rounded-sm border border-cyan-500 bg-black/50 text-cyan-400 hover:bg-cyan-500 hover:text-black transition-all duration-300 uppercase tracking-widest shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(0,240,255,0.2)]
buttons.echo: rounded-full bg-gradient-to-r from-pink-400 to-yellow-400 text-white hover:scale-105 transition-transform duration-300 shadow-lg font-medium tracking-wide

cards.vampire: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 hover:border-cyan-500/50 transition-colors
cards.echo: bg-white/60 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/40 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow

inputs.vampire: bg-black/50 border-b-2 border-zinc-700 focus:border-cyan-500 outline-none text-white placeholder:text-zinc-500
inputs.echo: bg-white/80 rounded-xl border border-pink-100 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-pink-200 outline-none text-slate-700

transitions.page: AnimatePresence mode='wait'. Variants: { initial: { opacity: 0, y: 20 }, animate: { opacity: 1, y: 0 }, exit: { opacity: 0, y: -20 } }

special_effects.glitch: CSS clip-path animation for Vampire titles

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME CONTEXT: Create a 'ThemeContext' that wraps the app. It must persist to localStorage. Toggle class 'dark' on the HTML element for Tailwind dark mode support.
3. FONT SETUP: Import 'Rajdhani', 'Poppins', and 'Bangers' from Google Fonts in index.css.
4. ROUTING: Use React Router. Wrap routes in <AnimatePresence> for page transitions.
5. TRIBUTE PAGE: This is sensitive. Ensure the design is respectful. Use the 'couple_placeholder' but with a sepia or B&W filter.
6. COMIC LAYOUT: For the About page, use CSS Grid. Create a 'ComicPanel' component that accepts a 'variant' prop (vampire/echo) to switch border styles.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to the Theme Toggle button ('theme-toggle'), Login button ('login-btn'), and Gallery Upload button ('upload-btn').
